name: Alpha-v (Prototype)
description: Alpha-V is an experimental bio-mechanical weapon created by a war-financed organization in the near future of 2099. One of a line of ‘sentient weapons’, designed to be deployed into warzones and quickly dispatch opposing military powers, it defects from its life of servitude and plans to escape the facility where it is held. A compound filled with its many siblings is all that stands in the way of freedom. In its hands sits a railgun that will guarantee nobody stops them on the way out.
